summary: 1977  was a common year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1977  was a common year starting on Saturday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1977th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 977th year of the 2nd millennium, the 77th year of the 20th century, and the 8th year of the 1970s decade.
